name: Satish Rao
content: Satish Rao's Home Page Satish Rao Professor Computer Science Division 687 Soda Hall University of California Berkeley, CA 94720-1776 Phone: (510) 642-4328 Fax: (510) 642-5775 Email:satishr is my username and the hostname is cs.berkeley.edu Contents : Teaching / Research Interests / Recent Papers / Selected Papers / Contact information / Office Hours / Other Office Hours CS270: See Edstem. Soda 687. Teaching CS270 Fall 2025 Research interests Design and analysis of algorithms Combinatorial optimization Papers. DBLP list of papers. Google Scholar Some no so recent papers: see DBLP!
